emailLogin.title: Email login
emailLogin.emailInvalid: Please provide a valid email address

signatureLogin.title: Signature method login
signatureLogin.enter12wordsDescription1: Your 12 words will stay on your device, to sign a message to authenticate you.
signatureLogin.enter12wordsDescription2: Please make sure that you enter your seed phrase on a verified, open-source build.
signatureLogin.enter12wordsDescription3: Still, this connection method is not considered 100% safe, as your device is connected to the internet, and therefore vulnerable. We are not responsible for any loss caused by the use of this login method.

signup.currencyDescription: The default currency of your Business
signup.referralCodeDescription: If someone brought you to Swiss Bitcoin Pay, please write their referral code here
signup.submitDescription1: By creating your account, you're accepting our

settings.title: Settings
settings.scanOtherColleagues: Other colleagues can scan to cash in for
settings.merchantNameDescription: The merchant name is present in all invoices you and your employees generates
settings.currencyDescription: The default currency of your account
settings.currencyChangeWarning: You actually receive {{fiatPercent}}% of your payments in {{currency}}. If you change your account's currency, your next payments will be converted to this new currency.
settings.onchainAvailableDescription: Tick this box if you want the invoices generated by the app to also accept Onchain payments from clients (recommended)
settings.emailDescription: The email where you can receive notifications and important informations
settings.confirmLogoutDescription: After logout, you will need to re-scan the activation code or connect with credentials

payoutConfig.title: Payout configuration
payoutConfig.iWantToReceive: I want to receive my funds...
payoutConfig.messageToSignDetails: Sign this message with the Bitcoin wallet you entered
payoutConfig.yourSignatureDetails: Signature you obtained from your wallet
payoutConfig.payInvoiceToCertify: Pay this 1 sat invoice to certify that you control your Lightning Address
payoutConfig.signWithAddressDetails: Sign the message with this Bitcoin address
payoutConfig.receiveInBtcDescription1: All the bitcoins that you charge via Swiss Bitcoin Pay will be sent to the address you provide.
payoutConfig.receiveInBtcDescription2: Lightning to Onchain conversions and miner fees are always free of charge for you.
payoutConfig.receiveInBtcDescription3: Payout is done every day at 0:00 UTC. Minimum threshold is 1000 sats.
payoutConfig.receiveInBtcDescription3Lightning: Your bitcoins will be instantly sent to your lightning address after each payment. Make sure that your node is well connected.
payoutConfig.receiveInBtcDescription4: A cryptographic signature of your Bitcoin wallet is required to prove ownership.
payoutConfig.receiveInBankDescription1: All the bitcoins that you charge via Swiss Bitcoin Pay will be sold for {{currency}} then sent automatically to your bank account through our partner
payoutConfig.receiveInBankDescription2Instant: The payment to your bank account is made automatically as soon as your balance exceeds the minimum of {{formattedAmount}}.
payoutConfig.receiveInBankDescription2Batched: The payment to your bank account is automatically done everyday at 0:00 UTC if your balance exceeds the minimum of {{formattedAmount}}.
payoutConfig.receiveInBankDescription2Swift: Swift transfers in {{currency}} are subject to Swift bank fees, which are not predictable and can represent 5% to 30% additional fees.
payoutConfig.receiveInBankDescription3: Below this amount, it is also possible to manually trigger a transfer, for a fee of {{formattedAmount}}.
payoutConfig.receiveInBankDescriptionInstantSepa: If your bank is Instant SEPA compatible, you will receive your payments instantly into your bank account.
payoutConfig.receiveInBankDescriptionFasterPayments: The payment to your bank account in GBP is made instantly via Faster Payments.
payoutConfig.patchSettingNeedsEmailValidation: Confirm the new settings via the email you received

wallet.title: Onchain wallet
wallet.receiveInfo:
Receive bitcoins directly to your local wallet with this unused address.
Payments received directly to this address are not tracked by Swiss Bitcoin Pay and therefore are not subject to fees and are not included in exports.

step1.instructions1: Owning a bitcoin wallet means you are solely responsible for it.
step1.instructions2: Take a moment to read carefully this short introduction to understand what it really means, otherwise it might increase the risk of your funds being lost or stolen.
step1.instructions3: Please note that if this were to happen, no one will be able to help recovering your funds, even Swiss Bitcoin Pay.
step1.instructions4: We store no copy of your wallet keys or your funds. We cannot access it or recover it. You are the only one responsible of the security of your wallet.

step2.instructions1: In the next step, we'll display your 12 words (also called seed phrase). This secret seed phrase is the only way to access your bitcoins.
step2.instructions2: Your seed phrase is generated securely and localy on your device, and is never sent to our servers.
step2.instructions3: Write it down on a durable medium and keep it in a secure place.
step2.instructions4: If you lose your seed phrase, your funds will be lost forever. It is therefore absolutely critical to properly store and protect your seed phrase.
step2.instructions5: Never save it in a cloud, on your phone, or computer. Any device connected to the internet is vulnerable!
step2.instructions6: Never share your seed phrase to anyone. Any person that access your seed phrase will be able to steal all of your funds.
step2.agree1: I understand that I am the only one responsible of the storage of my seed phrase.
step2.agree2: I understand that losing my seed phrase or a theft seeing it will result in a loss of funds.
step2.agree3: I understand that nobody can help to recover my funds if I lose my seed phrase, not even Swiss Bitcoin Pay.

step3.instructions1: Write down your 12 words and make sure it is clearly readable.
step3.instructions2: Please make sure to respect the words order!
step3.instructions3: This seed phrase was generated from 100% open-source code and is never leaving your device.

step5.instructions2: Store your seed phrase in a safe place, and never show it to anyone!
